seo.title: Arienzo Beach에서 Hostel Brikette로 돌아가는 버스
seo.description: Climb from the shoreline to the road, ride three kilometres to Chiesa Nuova, and finish with a short walk back to Hostel Brikette.

intro: Skip the full stair climb by catching the Amalfi Coast bus from Arienzo back toward Positano.
Buy your return ticket in town before heading to the beach — there is no vendor at Arienzo, so plan ahead or use the shuttle boat back to Spiaggia Grande.

sections.title: Walk up to the bus stop
body: Climb the stairs from the beach to the road and cross carefully to the inland side.
Look for the blue-and-white SITA sign on the metal pole opposite the entrance path and wait on the lay-by.

sections.title: Ride the Amalfi Coast bus
body: Flag the coach as it approaches and have your validated ticket ready.
Expect the journey to cover about 3 kilometres (1.9 miles) with a few intermediate stops before Positano.

sections.title: Get off at Bar Internazionale / Chiesa Nuova
body: Listen for the announcement or watch for the Bar Internazionale tabacchi — the stop sits opposite the hostel.
Press the stop button early so the driver knows to drop you at Chiesa Nuova.

sections.title: Walk back to Hostel Brikette
body: Continue in the direction the bus was heading for just over 100 metres (330 feet).
Take the staircase on your right back up to Hostel Brikette's main entrance.

tips: 인쇄된 시간표에는 포지타노 정류장만 나와 있습니다. 돌아오는 길에 Arienzo가 Positano Sponda보다 2~5분 정도 먼저 도착할 것으로 예상합니다.
There is no ticket vendor at Arienzo. Buy your return ticket in town, or be ready to walk to Positano Sponda or take the water shuttle back to Spiaggia Grande.
Read our %LINK:arienzoBeachClub|Arienzo Beach guide% for facilities, shuttles, and planning tips.
Browse the %LINK:beaches|Positano beaches overview% to compare other coves and plan future visits.

items.alt: 금속 기둥에 부착된 파란색과 흰색 SITA 버스 정류장 표지판
items.caption: 도로 안쪽, 아리엔초 위쪽에 있는 SITA 정류장 표지를 찾아보세요.
